name: vuejs-logger
author: Justin Kames
description: Vuejs-logger, provides customizable logging functionality for Vue.js.

scripts.build-transpile-uglify: node_modules/babel-cli/bin/babel.js src --out-dir dist && node_modules/uglify-js/bin/uglifyjs dist/logger.js -c -m -o dist/logger.js
scripts.build-transpile: node_modules/babel-cli/bin/babel.js src --out-dir dist && node_modules/uglify-js/bin/uglifyjs dist/logger.js -c -m -o dist/logger.js
